function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global nature of climate change and COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of cross-border transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Global cooperation and coordination in response and mitigation efforts","Technologies":"Global communication and data-sharing technologies","People":"Global population","Owner":"International organizations and governments"},{"Description":"Differences in national responses to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Inconsistent containment measures and spread of contagious diseases across different countries","Mitigation":"Standardized international guidelines and protocols for pandemic response","Technologies":"Data analytics and surveillance technologies for monitoring and analyzing disease spread","People":"National governments, public health agencies","Owner":"World Health Organization, international health associations"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of pandemic measures for climate change response","Impact":"Inappropriate application of pandemic measures to climate change mitigation","Mitigation":"Clear communication and education on the differences between pandemic response and climate change action","Technologies":"Educational platforms and awareness campaigns","People":"General population, policy makers","Owner":"Global environmental organizations, educational institutions"}]}
